name: Call of Pets: Modern Wizard
description:
CoP is a project made by a group of 4 devs for brackeys 2022.2 game jam, where the theme was "You are not alone". The game was designed and made in 1 week but we still plan on a future development of this project with more content like maps, enemies, costumes, mechanics and more!

   CoP is a 3rd person top-down shooter with slightly comic elements about a wizard who is trying to save his little friends. The goal is to survive almost unending waves of enemies with the help of your companions. Each companion/pet can give you different types of buffs and skills that will help you throughout your journey like more attack speed, more damage and even shields to protect from enemy bullets.  

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse0 - Firing

ESC - Pause

E / Q - Pick up / Drop down weapons

F - Interact with NPC/Pet

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Dash
